description.p1: This website allows you to play your game console through a video capture device, eliminating the need for any video capture software installations. While there may be a slight delay in frames compared to desktop video capture software like OBS, it still provides a satisfactory gaming experience for most games.
description.p2: This platform is solely designed for displaying video input from your video capture device. It does not support streaming or recording functions. For those features, please consider using software like OBS.

privacy.p1: This website is entirely static and does not transmit your device’s video and audio data to any backend server.
privacy.p2: While the site itself does not collect any data, it is hosted on GitHub Pages, which may gather certain information such as the visitor’s IP address by GitHub. For more details, please refer to GitHub’s Privacy Policy via the provided links.

warning.both: You need to enable both camera and micrphone permission to show your capture device input.
warning.camera: You need to enable camera permission to view the video input.
warning.microphone: You need to enable microphone permission to listen to the audio input.
warning.firefox:
(Chromium-based browser is recommended)

For Firefox user: You need to manually choose the permitted camera and microphone device from your browser settings. If necessary, you may also need to select it once more from the settings panel of this website.
